name: Joined Power
description:
Joined Power, is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Its a game where your goal is to power all the houses. Playing it as is with no instruction can be a bit confusing, so here's some tips. 

To start, move to the power line post on the left, and click "post" in the store, then while hovering around the environment, choose a spot to place it, and then left-click to place. Posts cost 100 coins. 

 

You should see the house light up, and you will get coins for each house you power. from there, you can select a desired pole to add a post to. The more houses you power, the more coins you get, and once you've powered every house, you win!
